Class MOMBI2<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.impl.AbstractEvolutionaryAlgorithm<S,​Result>
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.impl.AbstractGeneticAlgorithm<S,​java.util.List<S>>
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.mombi.AbstractMOMBI<S>
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.mombi.MOMBI<S>
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.mombi.MOMBI2<S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Algorithm<java.util.List<S>>, DescribedEntity
public class MOMBI2<S extends Solution<?>>
extends MOMBI<S>
Version:
1.0 This class implements the MOMBI2 algorithm (a.k.a. MOMBI-II)

Reference: Improved Metaheuristic Based on the R2 Indicator for Many-Objective Optimization. R. Hernández Gómez, C.A. Coello Coello. Proceeding GECCO '15 Proceedings of the 2015 on Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference. Pages 679-686 DOI: 10.1145/2739480.2754776

Author:
Juan J. Durillo
